data.eml:eml: Ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from the Joint Russian-Vietnamese Biological Expedition (October 2013 – April 2014)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niedbała, Wojciech, Ermilov, Sergey G. (2014): Ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from the Joint Russian-Vietnamese Biological Expedition (October 2013 – April 2014). Zootaxa 3884 (2): 156-168, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3884.2.4
